name: The King's Rule: Mathematics and Discovery
overview: Mathematics and discovery category teaching hypotheses formation and deductive reasoning, mathematics for educational Level: Grade 4—Adult. THE KING'S RULE is an interactive reasoning skills program. The game creates an interactive environment to assist upper-elementary students to look for hidden patterns and explore alternate explanations for observed behaviors of a system. Colorful figures guard each of the castle gates and present riddles which the student must answer using deductions tested prior to confronting the guard.
